citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am to
12 noon on 16-MAR-17.
Inspector knocked on door and waited 30 minutes at the facility.
